column5: The third cabin on the drive, Cabin 3, is the middle sized cabin. It sleeps up to four people with a king size bed and the bunk bed nook. This open concept cabin gives you enough room to stretch out for the long weekend. This cabin also has a full kitchen with everything you need except the food, plus a washer and dryer for your convenience. (Note* There will be a flat rate cleaning fee of $40 for bookings less than 3 nights and a $100.00 refundable pet deposit if you'd like to bring your pets)
